document.full_text: an egyptian blogger who criticized egypt's army on his blog and has called himself "pro-israel," was sentenced to three years in jail on monday by a military court.
document.title: the lede: blogger jailed for insulting egypt's military
lines_and_colors: an egyptian blogger who criticized egypt's army on his blog and has called himself "pro-israel," was sentenced to three years in jail on monday by a military court.
